title: Distribution of egalitarian democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It combines information on voting rights, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which the protection of rights, access to power, and distribution of resources is equal. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
